THE UNIVERSITY OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK
THE STATE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT
ALBANY, NEW YORK 12224
DIVISION OF EDUCATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS
LEE E. CAMPION, DIRECTOR
GR 4-5974
/
January 25, 1965
Miss Marion Corwell
Associate Director
Dearborn Public Schools
4824 Lois
Dearborn, Michigan 48126
Dear Marion:
My recent three days in Washington proved to be
extremely busy days. I was unable to arrange an appointÂ¬
ment with Harold Hill to discuss the speaker's guide.
I am going to try again for February 9 when I will
again be in Washington. I will let you know the results
of this meeting immediately after I return.
Sincerely yours
Lee E. Campion
Director
